data.text: @Chaela1982 @UKHSA_SouthWest I know and these people are supposed to be responsible for our health!
@UKHSA_SouthWest Are we really back to the flawed messaging of Feb-2020? Of course, basic hygiene is important but we now know #COVIDisAirborne - mask up!
@UKHSA_SouthWest If you REALLY want to limit the spread wear a damn mask! #COVIDisAirborne
@nickytgray2 @UKHSA_SouthWest Jeez the level of gaslighting still is unreal!
@UKHSA_SouthWest Wear a mask! It’s airborne incase you didn’t know.
